home.title: DevOps Engineer at Partech, passionate about cloud technologies and container orchestration.
home.description: I work daily on infrastructure management and optimization, while developing SumaOps, an open source dashboard for real-time Kubernetes cluster monitoring.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm currently working as a System Administrator and DevOps engineer at Partech and Accenture.
about.paragraph2: In parallel, I build personal tools as a hobby to learn, experiment, and push beyond my comfort zone.

experiences.description: Advanced Linux system administration, Docker container management, Kubernetes and Openshift orchestration.
Deployment of containerized workloads with Kubernetes & Openshift, infrastructure at scale.
Developed a GDPR engine for a large multimedia company.
Built and maintained a jewelry management database software.
